Title: Ane Log: Moyako Neesan no Honpen wo Tobidashite Tomaranai Monologue
Description: ['Short flash episodes included on the Ane Log Fan Disc.', ' ', ' ', ' ', " The story centers on Moyako Konoe and her younger brother Akira. When they were younger, Akira proposed to her, so Moyako thinks he is a pervert who has fallen in love with his older sister.
